derivation: of uncertain affinity; properly, right (by intrinsic or divine character; thus distinguished from 1342, which refers rather to human statutes and relations; from G2413 (ὅσιος), which denotes formal consecration;
strongs_def: and from G40 (ὅσιος), which relates to purity from defilement), i.e. hallowed (pious, sacred, sure)
outline: 1. undefiled by sin, free from wickedness, religiously observing every moral obligation, pure holy, pious
